title: Point Pointset Metadata
description: Information about a specific point name of the device.

units.description: Expected unit configuration for the point

writable.description: Indicates if this point is writable (else read-only)

baseline_value.description: Represents the expected baseline value of the point

baseline_state.description: Expected state when `baseline_value` is set as the `set_value` for this point the config message

cov_increment.description: Triggering threshold for partial cov update publishing

ref.description: Mapping for the point to an internal resource (e.g. BACnet object reference)

min_loglevel.description: The minimum loglevel for reporting log messages below which log entries should not be sent. Default to 300.

sample_limit_sec.description: Minimum time between sample updates for the device (including complete and COV updates). Updates more frequent than this should be coalesced into one update.

sample_rate_sec.description: Maximum time between samples for the device to send out a complete update. It can send out updates more frequently than this. Default to 600.
